About SankalpTaru Organic Greens

A Kitchen garden is a pledge to go greener, it starts with the right tools, a little time and easy-to-follow directions and you’ll be on your way to developing your kitchen thumb. We at SankalpTaru offer you more reasons to Grow and Go Greener. We understand that staying in metro cities, constraints you from growing vegetables due to lack of open spaces. However we value your zeal. Wouldn’t it be great if you can grow a kitchen garden to enjoy safe, flavorful and nutritious homegrown food and ensure a greener healthier world for yourself and your family?

The concept of kitchen gardening is to ensure that people can produce fresh fruits, vegetables and herbs for quick delicious and healthy meals at their own place. Well, the space required is very small like say 6 Sq.ft size. That\'s right! As big as your computer table. Start growing your own vegetables organically with us at your place to lead a healthy life...

MISSION

  1. To create awareness among masses about organic kitchen gardening and help them to stay closer to nature and eat healthy.
  2. To help them grow a kitchen garden in a compact format to produce organic vegetables, herbs and fruits at a very less space with better nutritive value.
  3. To assist them in the process of setup and overcome typical challenges.

Visit http://store.sankalptaru.org to get registered.

After successful registration you may need to enter the same credentials to login and use Sankalptaru Organic Greens mobile application.

If you already have an account then you can straight away use your login credentials.
